Table of Contents

Interface ISettingsService

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Services
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Defines the contract for a centralized settings management service. Provides thread-safe access to application preferences with notification events.

public interface ISettingsService

Remarks

This service manages all application settings with the following guarantees:

  • Thread-safe read/write operations for concurrent access
  • Type-safe conversion with built-in parsing and validation
  • Change notifications via OnPreferenceChanged event
  • Persistence across application restarts
  • Caching for performance (with configurable expiration)

All methods return DTOs instead of entities to maintain separation of concerns.

Methods

ExportToFileAsync(string, CancellationToken)

Exports all settings to a JSON file at the specified path.

Task ExportToFileAsync(string filePath, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

filePath string

Full path where the settings file will be created.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if filePath is null or whitespace.

UnauthorizedAccessException

Thrown if write access to the directory is denied.

DirectoryNotFoundException

Thrown if the directory path doesn't exist.

IOException

Thrown if an I/O error occurs while creating the file.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

GetBoolAsync(string, bool, CancellationToken)

Retrieves a boolean value for the specified key.

Task<bool> GetBoolAsync(string key, bool defaultValue = false, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

key string

The setting identifier (case-insensitive).

defaultValue bool

The value to return if the key doesn't exist.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<bool>

The stored boolean value, or defaultValue if not found.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if key is null or whitespace.

InvalidCastException

Thrown if the stored value cannot be converted to boolean.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

GetDoubleAsync(string, double, CancellationToken)

Retrieves a double-precision floating point value for the specified key.

Task<double> GetDoubleAsync(string key, double defaultValue = 0, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

The setting identifier (case-insensitive).

defaultValue double

The value to return if the key doesn't exist.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<double>

The stored double value, or defaultValue if not found.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if key is null or whitespace.

InvalidCastException

Thrown if the stored value cannot be converted to double.

OverflowException

Thrown if the stored value represents a number less than MinValue or greater than MaxValue.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

SetValueAsync(string, string, CancellationToken)

Stores a string value for the specified key.

Task SetValueAsync(string key, string value, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

key string

The setting identifier (case-insensitive).

value string

The value to store (null values are converted to empty string).

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.

Remarks

Triggers OnPreferenceChanged event after successful persistence.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if key is null or whitespace.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

UpdatePreferencesBatchAsync(List<UpdatePreferenceDto>, CancellationToken)

Updates multiple preferences in a single batch operation.

Task<int> UpdatePreferencesBatchAsync(List<UpdatePreferenceDto> updates, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

updates List<UpdatePreferenceDto>

List of preference updates.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<int>

The number of preferences successfully updated.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if updates is null.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

Events

OnPreferenceChanged

Event triggered whenever a preference value is successfully updated.

event EventHandler<PreferenceChangedEventArgs> OnPreferenceChanged

Event Type

EventHandler<PreferenceChangedEventArgs>
